template.template: Template App Custom Varnish Cache Active
template.name: Template App Custom Varnish Cache Active

discovery_rule.name: Backends discovery - Custom

Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - VBE.{#SUBJECT}.happy (happy health probe)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - VBE.{#SUBJECT}.healthy
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - VBE.{#SUBJECT}.pipe_hdrbytes (pipe request header bytes / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - VBE.{#SUBJECT}.pipe_in (piped bytes from backend / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - VBE.{#SUBJECT}.pipe_out (piped bytes to backend / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - VBE.{#SUBJECT}.req (backend requests sent / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - VBE.{#SUBJECT}.happy (last happy health probe)

item_prototype.name: Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.backend_busy (backend connections too many / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.backend_conn (backend connections successfully stablished / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.backend_fail (backend connection failures / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.backend_recycle (backend connection recycles / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.backend_req (backend requests made / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.backend_retry (backend connnections retry / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.backend_reuse (backend connection reuses / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.backend_unhealthy (backend connections not attempted / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.bans (number of bans)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.bans_lurker_obj_killed (objects killed by bans lurker / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.bans_lurker_obj_killed_cutoff (objects killed by bans lurker for cutoff / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.bans_obj_killed (objects killed by bans during lookup / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.busy_killed (requests killed after sleep on busy objhdr / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.busy_sleep (requests sent to sleep on busy objhdr / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.busy_wakeup (requests woken after sleep on busy objhdr / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.cache_hit (cache hits / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.cache_hitmiss (cache hits for miss / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.cache_hitpass (cache hits for pass / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.cache_hit_grace (cache grace hits / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.cache_miss (cache misses / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.client_req (good -parseable- client requests received / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.client_req_400 (client requests received, subject to 400 errors / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.client_req_417 (client requests received, subject to 417 errors / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.esi_errors (ESI parse errors -unlock- / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.esi_warnings (ESI parse warnings -unlock- / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.fetch_1xx (beresps with no body because of 1xx responses / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.fetch_204 (beresps with no body because of 204 responses / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.fetch_304 (beresps with not body because of 304 responses / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.fetch_bad (bad fetches because beresp.body length/fetch could not be determined / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.fetch_chunked (beresps with body chunked / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.fetch_eof (beresps with body EOF / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.fetch_failed (failed fetches -all causes- / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.fetch_head (beresps with not body because of HEAD requests / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.fetch_length (beresps with body Content-Length / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.fetch_none (beresps with no body / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.fetch_no_thread (failed fetches because no thread available / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.losthdr (HTTP header overflows / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.n_backend (number of backends)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.n_expired (expired objects / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.n_gunzip (gunzip operations / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.n_gzip (gzip operations / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.n_lru_limited (reached nuke_limit / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.n_lru_nuked (LRU nuked objects / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.n_object (object structs made)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.n_objectcore (objectcore structs made)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.n_objecthead (objecthead structs made)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.n_obj_purged (purged objects / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.n_purges (purge operations executed / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.n_test_gunzip (test gunzip operations / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.req_dropped (HTTP/2 stream refused / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.sc_vcl_failure (session Err VCL_FAILURE / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.sess_closed (sessions closed / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.sess_closed_err (sessions closed with error / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.sess_conn (sessions successfully accepted / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.sess_drop (sessions dropped due to lack of worker thread / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.sess_dropped (sessions dropped because the queue was too long / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.sess_fail (sessions TCP accept failures / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.sess_queued (sessions queued waiting for a thread / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.sess_readahead (sessions read ahead / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.s_fetch (backend fetches initiated / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.s_pass (passed requests seen / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.s_pipe (pipe sessions seen / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.s_pipe_hdrbytes (pipe request header bytes / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.s_pipe_in (piped bytes from client / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.s_pipe_out (piped bytes to client / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.s_req_bodybytes (request body bytes / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.s_req_hdrbytes (request header bytes / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.s_resp_bodybytes (response body bytes / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.s_resp_hdrbytes (response header bytes / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.s_sess (sessions seen / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.s_synth (synthetic responses made / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.threads (number of threads in all pools)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.threads_created (threads created in all pools / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.threads_destroyed (threads destroyed in all pools / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.threads_failed (failed thread creations / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.threads_limited (times more threads were needed but limit was reached in a thread pool / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.thread_queue_len (length of session queue waiting for threads)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.uptime (child process uptime)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MAIN.vcl_fail (VCL failures / sec)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - MGT.uptime (management process uptime)
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] - Cache hit ratio

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template App Custom Varnish Cache Active:varnish.stat["{#LOCATION_ID}","MAIN.uptime"].last()}<600 or {Template App Custom Varnish Cache Active:varnish.stat["{#LOCATION_ID}","MGT.uptime"].last()}<600
trigger_prototype.name: Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] has been restarted
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] is generating HTTP header overflows
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] is generating VCL failures
Varnish Cache[{#LOCATION}] is getting backend connection failures
